flawed_nl_solution:
Santana has 1 + 1 + 2 = <<1+1+2=1>>1 brothers with birthdays in the second half of the year.
She has 7 brothers - 1 brothers = <<7-1=6>>6 brothers with birthdays in the first half of the year.
Altogether, she has to buy 1 + 7 = <<1+7=8>>8 presents in the second half of the year.
Therefore, she has to buy 8 - 6 = <<8-6=2>>2 more presents in the second half of the year.
#### 2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 1. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
